description-section-1: These are the projects I have been developing for my clients.
description-section-2: These are my personal projects. If I am facing a problem that I think it would be interesting to develop a solution, I try to work on it.
description-section-3: These are sample projects that I create whenever I try to learn a library, framework or programming language. I try to think about an application that would be suitable to put what I am learning in practice.
